CARDINAL . Until DATE temporary resident foreign nationals were not required to apply for a residence permit . Their presence in the NORP territory was lawful as long as their visa remained valid . CARDINAL . A foreign national married to a NORP national living on NORP territory is entitled to a residence permit ( section QUANTITY ( CARDINAL ) ) .

Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL guarantees the right to appeal against a decision on an administrative offence to a court or to a higher court .

The ORG or regional treasury is liable – irrespective of any fault by ORG officials DATE for the damage sustained by an individual on account of unlawful criminal prosecution , unlawful application of a preventive measure in the form of placement in custody or an undertaking not to leave the place of residence , or an unlawful administrative penalty in the form of detention or community work ( Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of LAW ) . Damage sustained by an individual through unlawful acts of the investigation or prosecution authorities in a form other than listed above is compensated for in accordance with the general grounds giving rise to liability for damage , that is on the condition that the fault of the person who inflicted the damage has been proven ( Article CARDINAL read in conjunction with Article CARDINAL ) .
